summary.span: 表示一个椭圆形的触笔笔尖。

span.span: Represents a stylus tip shaped like an ellipse.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 ，并将其传递给 方法以擦除部分 。The following example demonstrates how to create an and pass it to the method to erase a portion of a . 此示例假定存在一个名为 `eraseTester` 的 ，并且其 事件已连接到此示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example assumes that there is a called `eraseTester` and that its event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example. 若要创建使用户能够擦除墨迹的控件，请参阅[如何：清除自定义控件上的墨迹](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control)。To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control).
